ColumnTextComponent.Name: Dance Alliance Column
ColumnTextComponent.TextColumn:
Featuring Dance Alliance:

Dance Alliance presents "I'm an American," a celebration and reminder of all that is good in our country.  The dancers will honor those who have contributed to making our country a great place to live and will leave the audience with feelings of pride and appreciation for America.  Through varied styles of dance, immigrant stories will come to life and homage will be paid to those who have sacrificed to protect and preserve the freedoms and liberties that we continue to enjoy.

For more information about the tour, contact:

Dale Hillier

208-496-3115

hillierd@byui.edu
